choose.when: select b.user_no as userNo, b.no, b.title, b.user_name as userName, b.hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, depth from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc limit #{page} , 5
choose.otherwise: select b.user_no as userNo, b.no, b.title, b.user_name as userName, b.hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, depth from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no and title like '%${kwd}%' order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc limit #{page} , 5

mapper.select: select b.no, b.user_no as userNo, b.title, b.contents, b.user_name as userName, b.hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no and b.no=#{no} order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc

choose.when: insert into board values(null, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, (select num from( select ifnull(max(g_no)+1,1) as num from board) tmp), 1, 0, now(), #{userNo}, #{userName})

mapper.update: update board set o_no = o_no+1 where o_no > #{orderNo} and g_no=#{groupNo}
mapper.delete: delete from board where no = #{no} and user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where no=#{no}
update board set hit=ifnull(hit,0)+1 where no = #{no}

choose.otherwise: select count(*) from board where title like '%${_parameter}%' or contents like '%${_parameter}%'
